// Pivot 0, 0
int Flipper[14] = {
	5, 1,
	15, 0,
	57, 6,
	55, 9,
	15, 15,
	5, 13,
	1, 6
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float Flipper[14] = {
	0.086207f, 0.062500f,
	0.258621f, 0.000000f,
	0.982759f, 0.375000f,
	0.948276f, 0.562500f,
	0.258621f, 0.937500f,
	0.086207f, 0.812500f,
	0.017241f, 0.375000f
};
